title: New: Darlia – Queen of Hearts
body:
Photo:Juan Jose Ortiz

Blackpool’s **Darlia** are a strange one, their sound has elements of Blur to it, yet with the heavier, 90’s grunge, American influenced tinge.

With it’s semi-rapped verses and radio ready chorus, it’s not hard to see why it’s already caught the attention of Zane Lowe, and will undoubtedly transfer over to daytime play in no time at all. It’s raw, uncompromising, and bloody brilliant. Check out _Queen of Hearts_ below, and catch them on a short UK tour which starts tomorrow, dates after the jump.

Sept 17 – The Cockpit 3, Leeds

Sept 19 – Independent Room 2, Sunderland

Sept 20 – Ku Bar, Stockton On Tees

Sept 21 – The Mad Ferrett, Preston

Sept 22 – The Rainbow Courtyard, Birmingham

Sept 23 – Sugarmill, Stoke On Trent

Sept 25 – Fallow Cafe, Manchester

Sept 26 – 53 Degrees @ UCLAN, Preston

Sept 27 – Great Gatsby – Sheffield
